name: InfiniVirus
description:
Infinite (not yet still learning) Zombie shooting game No zombies yet just  BEAN(epic reverb)

I am learning Unity while making this game

How to Play: Shoot zombies if one zombie hurts you and your damage counter reaches 100 you die.

if someone can get to 500 money on pretest 2 You get a skin if or when the item shop comes just send picture in comments and give me your discord
